attributes.action: GIVE ENGLAND WORKERS NHS/CARERS/SOCIAL WORKER £500 BONUS!
attributes.additional_details: The government say England workers won't get the bonus and we don't want it! We absolutely do!
attributes.background: We want the same recognition as our fellow colleagues in Wales and Scotland, we have worked so hard throughout this pandemic and not only risked our selves but our family and the people we care for too.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

To pay every NHS and Social Care Worker in England a £500 "Thank You" Bonus
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562495
